moves.description: Update the START command metadata with game parameter options
moves.details: Add parameter options to the START command in src/commands/metadata.ts, similar to what's already in the CONFIG command for games.

moves.description: Update the GameService to handle custom game settings
moves.details: Modify the createGame method in GameService to accept optional custom settings and create a GameSettings record when provided.
Update the StartCommand class to extract, validate, and use custom parameters from the interaction.

moves.description: Add validation schemas for input parameters
moves.details: Reuse validation schemas from ConfigCommand or create new ones for the StartCommand parameters.

moves.description: Improve success message with custom settings summary
moves.details: Update the success message to include a summary of custom settings when they differ from server defaults.

moves.description: Test the command with various parameter combinations
moves.details: Test with no parameters, some parameters, all parameters, and invalid values to ensure proper handling.
